[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [ElementStyles](../fast-element.elementstyles/index.html)

## ElementStyles class

Represents styles that can be applied to a custom element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ElementStyles 
```
